attributes.review: There’s a virus in the app and i don’t think that they’re gonna do anything to help it unless it starts effecting them.... so you can just straight up delete this app from the App Store 🙈
attributes.title: Virus

attributes.review: I mean if you’re downloading a campaign app, you must’ve expected it to be bad. Couldn’t get it to download for day, but not shocked cuz it’s an about an orange who thinks making America white is cute. But you know, trump2020🧚🏻✨🌈 on a gravestone
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: This app is racial platform it’s very disrespectful forward people of color my god father that is black got racially profiled on this app they do not support BLACK LIVES MATTER on this app and it’s disrespectful and so disgusting that we’ll call this man our president
attributes.title: Racism at its finest💔

attributes.review: The quality was terrible, I tried purchasing merchandise and it would not allow me. It kept glitching please remove this from the AppStore
attributes.title: This app was AWFUL

attributes.review: Dint even work u tried it and i had ti wait like an hour and when it finished loading it kicked me out😐 so I basically waited an hour for nothing worst app ever!
attributes.title: baddest app on here!

attributes.review: This app has caused me to lose my VISION. My little cousin is currently typing out this review for me. As soon as I opened the app I saw this BLINDING orange light! After that my vision got blurry then it just vanished! This app is toxic!
attributes.title: Opened app and went blind

attributes.review: this app is one of the worst I’ve ever used! Not only is the layout unappealing to the eye, but the app is slow and ineffective. I absolutely would not recommend this to anyone. do not download!!!!
attributes.title: AWFUL!!!

attributes.review: This app is the worst. After 2min of using this horrible app me and my family almost died. I do not recommend at all whatever you do do not download this garbage app.
attributes.title: The death app!!!😡🤬

attributes.review: Took forever to download, and then it kept crashing over all just a terrible app with a terrible set up you can’t find anything on this app a toddler could make a better app than this. DONT DOWNLOAD ITS A WASTE OF TIME!!!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: i download this app to support our lovely president but it DOES NOT WORK! i’ve downloaded it multiple times now but it honestly needs some work done!! or just delete the entire app 😒
